Name: Resonance
Desc:
Creates a broad sword made of magic to resonate with an Ether Crystal and charge towards the crystal. Swords can be sent flying towards the nearest crystal in 8 directions by using the skill with the directional keys.
Can only be used with an Ether Crystal in range or chained with Impale.
Linking with Impale reduces the creation time of the Broad Sword and charges towards the direction of the Ether Sword.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Impale of above
Lv. 10 Effect: Can learn Marker.

H.Old:
Destroys the Ether Crystal resonating from Resonance.
Attacks up to 6 enemies at 502% DAMAGE 6 times.
Casts a buff that increases FINAL DAMAGE +10% and IGNORE DEF +10% for 30 sec. on hit.
H.New:
Destroys the Ether Crystal resonating from Resonance.
Attacks up to 6 enemies at 105% Damage 6 times.
Casts a buff that increases Final Damage +10% and Ignore DEF +10% for 30 sec. on hit.
